Each par*cipant is given a PaV ballot form and casts a vote: - marks an X - separates the two halves - shreds the names - submits the remaining half (receipt)
They also decide, before submission, if their receipt will be made public to the other par*cipants: they mark Post or Not post.
For each vote cast, par*cipants select who they think that vote was for. If the receipt for that vote is `posted, then they get to see it when making their selec*on.
Par*cipants do not know which of them cast the vote. They have nothing to go on, except (possibly) the posted receipt.
